entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Produce binlogs by default in CI & internal builds #57030
  • Perf regression: json_middleware, mvc, single_query #57027
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #57026
  • Using middleware in asp net Core 8.0 #57025
  • Blazor needs to be more object oriented and event handlers need to be revised. #57024
  • Net 8 Blazor Web App (Interactive server w/ prerendering ) - multiple schemes doens't work #57023
  • .NET 8 Blazor Web App Scoped Dependency Injection Behavior #57022
  • `[ApiController]` attributes causes exception during serialization of `(Validation)ProblemDetails` when using source-generator-based serialization #57019
  • Unable to define anonymous object with "class" property #57018
  • default ForwardedHeader configutaion #57017
  • Invalid trim warning suppression in BindConverter #57016
  • TypeError: Failed to execute 'fetch' in Blazor Webassembly #57015

Closed

  • Perf improvement: plaintext, plainTextEmptyFilter #56987
  • Perf improvement: json, plaintext, plaintext #56998
  • Add an inputRange component like the basic inputNumber components #52067
    Backlog
  • Some thoughts on npm package-lock/cache in the VMR #54541
    9.0-preview6
  • Kestrel as a TCP server only #56790
  • Update the Blazor WebAssembly perf benchmarks to use a different docker image #55813
    9.0-rc1
  • TS/JS Warnings after creating a .NET 8 ASP.NET Core Web App #56471
  • Assets not found when calling app outside it's directory. Error: `filename.br` could not be found. #56851

PullRequests

Created

  • Resize hpack dynamic table down then back up #57034
    needs-area-label
  • [Blazor] Fix Identity UI accessibility issues #57033
    area-blazor, feature-identity-ui
  • Add some HPackDecoderTests for empty header names and values #57032
    area-networking
  • [release/6.0] Update `spa-templates` submodule #57029
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Try to reduce IIS test event log flakiness #57028
    area-networking

Merged

  • Make dev-certs import consistent with kestrel #57014
    area-networking, 9.0-rc1
  • Quarantine Locking_ExecuteAllRequestsWhenDisabled #55653
    area-middleware, 9.0-rc1
  • Enable input number component to support type='range' attribute #55583
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-rc1
  • Use Base64Url in WebEncoders #56959
    area-networking, 9.0-rc1
  • Fix Blazor WebAssembly perf benchmarks #56811
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, area-perf, 9.0-rc1
  • Disable codeql in quarantined-pr.yml #57011
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-rc1
  • Update Microsoft.IO.Redist dependency #57005
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-rc1

Updated

  • Add remarks to FromBodyAttrbiute #56997
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Allow ShowColumnOptionsAsync method to accept null parameter #56991
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Microsoft.extensions.api description.server allow specifying environment #55836
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/8.0] [Infrastructure] Update jquery validate periodically #56880
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • Navigation Exception: Introduce Clear Message #56644
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun
